title: Odion Ighalo - Wikipedia
snippet: Odion Jude Ighalo (born 16 June 1989) is a Nigerian professional footballer who plays as a forward. After starting his career at Nigerian clubs Prime and Julius Berger, Ighalo moved to Norwegian club Lyn in 2007. A year later, he was signed by Italian club Udinese, spending most of his tenure ...

title: Odion Ighalo | Football Wiki | Fandom
snippet: Odion Jude Ighalo (born 16 June 1989) is a Nigerian professional footballer who plays as a striker for Saudi club Al-Wehda and the Nigeria national team. After starting his career at Prime and Julius Berger, he moved to Norway's Lyn in 2007. ...

title: Odion Ighalo - Nigeria | Player Profile | Sky Sports Football
snippet: Odion Ighalo, who was on loan at Manchester United for a year, has completed a permanent transfer to Saudi Arabian club Al-Shabab.

title: Odion Ighalo facts for kids
snippet: After that, he moved to Saudi Arabia, playing for Al Shabab and Al-Hilal before joining Al-Wehda. He also played for the Nigerian national team. He represented Nigeria at the 2018 World Cup.
